chapters.title: Chapter 24: Honey in the Tea
chapters.info: Jennet, p. 528—Pretty, big-eyed Murandian Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. She was one of the sisters selected by the Aes Sedai in Salidar to return to the White Tower to ferret out any information possible. She has already been warned by Beonin that Beonin had betrayed their status to Elaida.
